name: left hieroglyphs
desc: On the left side of the room the hieroglyphs says, 'Intruders beware crushing death and grief, soaked with blood of the trespassing thief'

name: right hieroglyphs
desc: On the right side of the room the hieroglyphs says 'The key to my return lies within the heart of the underworld'

name: stone wheel
desc: There is a large stone wheel blocking the exit.
descMod: The large stone wheel seems to be moved out of the way.

name: cylinder
desc: Upon further investigation of the wall you notice that it's a sequence of pictures that proceed a recessed cylinder in the wall. The sequence is 3 Bulls, 1 Eagle, 4 Lions, 1 Sun.
descMod: The cylinder - consists of 0 to 9 Ox

name: stone door
desc: A small stone door that is set in the middle of the wall.
descMod: The small stone door seems to be open now.

name: door 1
desc: The giant stone door to your left is closed.
descMod: The giant stone door to your left is open.

name: door 2
desc: The giant stone door to your right is closed.
descMod: The giant stone door to your right is open.

name: odd hole
desc: As you look at the wall more closely, you notice the odd placement of the holes on the wall

name: switch
desc: The door has 4 switches located on it, all set in the up position.

name: falcon carving
desc: An ornate wall with the carving of a falcon on it.

name: lettered floor
desc: A floor layed out in a grid like pattern with different letters on it.

name: statue of osiris
desc: Statue of Osiris that has like small pressure plates on the head, chest and stomach of the statue..

name: statue of horus
desc: Statue of Horus that has like small pressure plates on the head, chest and stomach of the statue.

name: statue of anubis
desc: Statue of Anubis that has like small pressure plates on the head, chest and stomach of the statue..

name: noisy sarcophagus
desc: Upon closer inspection, the strange noises coming from the sarcophagus get louder and louder
descMod: Upon opening the sarcophagus, a mythical pharaoh mummy jumps out, makes a loud screech, and then kills you

name: urn
desc: There is a plain looking urn in the corner of the room.
descMod: Upon breaking open the urn, you see that it contains a yellow jeweled scarab necklace

name: sculpture of cat
desc: There is a small stone sculpture of an egyptian cat next to a mirror in the corner.

name: mirror spider
desc: There is something rustling around in the room by one of the mirrors.
descMod: The rustling turns out to be a gigantic spider.  The spider bites you and causes pain and injury.  Lose 1 turn.

name: food spider
desc: There is something rustling around in the room by one of the sacks of food.
descMod: The rustling turns out to be a gigantic spider.  The spider bites you and causes pain and injury.  Lose 1 turn.

name: sculpture of scarab
desc: There is a small stone sculpture of a scarab that looks like it was left as a gift for the great dead Pharaohs

name: book
desc: There is a book laying next to a skull in the room, and it appears to be a previous explorer's journal.

name: elephant tusk
desc: There is an elephant tusk in the corner that looks untouched by time and geology

name: shaky mummy
desc: As you walk toward the shaking mummy, the shaking gets stronger and it appears that the mummy might still be alive.
descMod: Upon closer inspection, the mummy turns out to be a mythical crocodile. It bites your arm causing great pain before scampering off into the dark. Lose 1 turn.

name: hieroglyphs
desc: Upon closer inspection, the hieroglyphs say, 'Here lies the end of this branch of the tomb. You must turn around.'

name: set
desc: A tapestry with an image of the god Set pointing a sword to the right.

name: adventurer
desc: An adventurer lies dead with his pack. There does not appear to be anything of much use except maybe some earplugs.
descMod: An adventurer lies dead with his pack. There does not appear to be anything of much use.

name: ra
desc: A tapestry with an image of the god Ra sitting on a throne.

name: isis
desc: A tapestry with an image of the goddess Isis kneeling.

name: weapons rack
desc: A rack filled with rusty weapons that are no longer useful in a fight but maybe useful for general utility.

name: door
desc: A locked wooden door. There is a keyhole that appears to unlock it.

name: siren statue
desc: A statue of a mermaid looking creature, it seems like a song is coming from it that makes it difficult to think.

name: jackal
desc: A statue of a dog-like human known as a Jackal, it is holding a spear and wearing what appears to be a necklace of a scarab.
descMod: A statue of a dog-like human known as a Jackal, it is holding a spear.

name: chimera
desc: A statue of a monster that has the head of a lion, the body of a goat and the tail of a serpent. It appears to be holding a brooch shaped like a scarab.
descMod: A statue of a monster that has the head of a lion, the body of a goat and the tail of a serpent.

name: writings
desc: Reading the writings tells you the story of the jackal that bested the chimera in battle.

name: sphinx
desc: A giant statue of sphinx holding a slab that reads: There are two sisters: one gives birth to the other and she, in turn, gives birth to the first. What are they?
descMod: After solving the puzzle the sphinx statue has revealed a spot to insert an item.

name: jeweled beetles
desc: Tons of gold beetles litter the floor, it would be best to just leave them be.

name: tomb
desc: A large tomb with a mummified pharaoh holding what appears to be a very valuable artifact.
descMod: A large tomb with a mummified pharaoh.

name: griffin
desc: A giant stone statue of a griffin, it looks like it’s beak could be pulled.

name: eagle
desc: A giant stone statue of an eagle, it looks like it’s beak could be pulled.
